definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: The prime minister was flying back to Islamabad from Lahore.
sentences.chinese: 吉拉尼總理當時正從拉合爾飛回伊斯蘭堡。

sentences.english: Lahore police say the U. S. diplomat was taken to a police facility and an investigation is under way.
sentences.chinese: 拉合爾市警方說，這名美國外交官被帶到警察部門。

sentences.english: A general view of the Shalimar Gardens in Lahore March 10, 2007.
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦拉合爾的沙莉馬花園外觀。

sentences.english: A city of west-central Pakistan west-southwest of Lahore .
sentences.chinese: 基達巴基斯坦中西部一城市，位於拉合爾西南偏西。

sentences.english: This is from the murder of 27 occurred in the eastern city of Lahore at a busy street.
sentences.chinese: 這起命案27日發生在拉合爾東部城區一處繁忙街道。

sentences.english: The police chief in Lahore called him a "cold-blooded murderer."
sentences.chinese: 拉合爾的警察總監說，戴維斯是個“冷血殺手”。

sentences.english: The police chief in Lahore called him a "cold-blooded murderer.
sentences.chinese: 拉合爾的警察總監說，戴維斯是個“冷血殺手”。

sentences.english: “Then we rode up the Karakoram Highway through northern Pakistan, ” his companion continued.
sentences.chinese: 然後我們騎上拉合爾公路穿越了北部的巴基斯坦。

sentences.english: This makeshift ring is on the outskirts of Lahore.
sentences.chinese: 這個臨時修建的摔跤場地在拉合爾郊外。

sentences.english: Take another bus or taxi the remaining 20km to Lahore.
sentences.chinese: 再搭巴士到20公里外的拉合爾。

sentences.english: The situation at JuD headquarters in Lahore was no better.
sentences.chinese: 位於拉合爾的達瓦慈善會總部的情況也好不到哪去。

sentences.english: It's very different, set in Lahore.
sentences.chinese: 非常與衆不同，開始在拉合爾。
